overview: Jim Gilliam is the founder and CEO of NationBuilder, the essential toolkit for a new generation of leaders and creators. Previously, he co-founded Robert Greenwald’s Brave New Films, building a non-profit grassroots media powerhouse of a million members. In the late 90’s, he launched Business.com as its Chief Technology Officer, and worked at Lycos, one of the first internet search engines. Gilliam has produced four documentaries, and was honored in 2008 with Take Back Americaâ€™s second annual Maria Leavey Tribute Award.
